Reviews.Title: CAMETACAMERA.COM ROCKS !!!

Reviews.Content: CAMERA : NIKON D 3200 COLOR: REDTHE SERVICE,SPEEDY SHIPPING & PACKAGING IS GREAT. !THE CAMERA BUNDLE KITS ARE FANTASTIC & A TREMENDOUS VALUE.!I RESEARCHED SEVERAL WEBSITES &DEALS AND THE ONE I PURCHASED WAS THE BEST !

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 16 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) + <2> Nikon 55-200mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Samyang 500mm Telephoto Lens + <4> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card +
<5> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <6> Additional Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <7> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <8> Rokinon 67" Monopod & Case +
<9> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <10> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <11> HB-45 Lens Hood + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <15> T Mount for Nikon + <16> Instruction Sheet for T-Mount
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) with 55-200mm VR & 500mm Tele Lens + 32GB Card + Monopod + Backpack + Telephoto & Wide-Angle Lenses + Accessory Kit
